Name: Cannon Crew
About the game: About Cannon Crew is a co-op Castle Defence Party game! Play with a team of 1-4 and work together to stop the enemy breaching your castle walls. Feel free to get competitive within your team - the more gold you can snatch or jobs you complete will give you a higher score than the others - but don't get too distracted from the incoming horde! Game Modes - Story Mode - Survival - Puzzles Difficulty The difficulty changes depending on number of players in-game. If you're playing with a team of 4 then enemy waves will arrive quicker and be harder to defeat - Singleplayer means enemies will move slower and take less hits. Planned Features - Online Co-Op - Uploading Custom Levels to Steam Workshop
Meta Title: Cannon Crew: Feb 1, 2018, WoksOnStudios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cannon Crew? Check out the release date (Feb 1, 2018), developer insights from WoksOnStudios, and a complete game summary.
